1.title: Double Castration
1.plot: The two boys start their trip and have their first stop at an Abbey in France, where they work and castrate two goats.

2.title: Zin in Pruimen
2.plot: This is where the amazing surf trip really begins. First Mimizan, then Hossegor at the Quicksilver Pro France.

3.title: Fiësta
3.plot: The van arrives in Spain, where every shop is closed during fiësta. That's very annoying if you don't have a watch.

4.title: Anorexia
4.plot: The surf dudes arrived in Mundaka at the Surf World Cup. After 1.5 months it was time for a good conversation about girls.

5.title: Beroemd
5.plot: When Leks and Stefke met the Billabong Film Crew in Mundaka at the surf contest, they became real stars in the Mundaka movie.

6.title: Mundaka
6.plot: On their trip along the European Atlantic coastline, looking for surf in their old camper van, they find a major world surf championship event in the little town of Mundaka, Basque country, Spain.

7.title: Een Frisse Neus
7.plot: After two weeks of excessive partying with the world's best surfers and the Billabong film crew in Mundaka, it is time for a nice stroll in the forest and around the Basque coast, looking for mushrooms and disturbing local wildlife.

8.title: Smulpaap
8.plot: In Bilbao our friends decide to go look for the famous beautiful Spanish women. Very disappointed about what they found, they buy a skateboard instead. After a fight, Stefke can keep the board and Lex can buy the same amount in chocolate.

9.title: Naaktstrand
9.plot: On their way to Santander, Leks and Stefke found a desolated beach in a beautiful setting. Dangerous waves coming through the rocks, to throw a lot of plastic rubbish on the beach...

10.title: Vliegtuigkresj
10.plot: On the next surf spot the two travelers discover some terrible items on the beach. Parts of an airplane and children's shoes. Does this tell a horrific story?

11.title: Wat Een Wind
11.plot: Is it the altitude or their strange sense of humor? When the two adventurers climb the Picos d'Europa they cannot stop laughing when a cow farts. It sets off a nice breeze though...

12.title: Vuile Wasjes
12.plot: When you are traveling low-budget in a van and refuse to use camping grounds, you have to find a way to wash your clothes. After a month it is not possible to postpone, but the Spanish police didn't agree.

13.title: Nog Liever De Zee In
13.plot: The atmosphere in the little old blue van is not getting any better if they get to a spot where the cannot surf. How can the stay at this beautiful spot without breakfast?

14.title: Bzzz
14.plot: After doing the laundry in the local river, the whole van is full of flies. Or is it the two boys and their limited hygienic skills?

15.title: Slappe Stok
15.plot: When the two strange guys from the blue van go surfing it looks like a slapstick, but what they don't realize is that the caves in northern Spain are full of dangers.

16.title: Harde Stok
16.plot: Without hesitating, Stefke took 3 pills that Leks gave him. Only afterwards he found out that it was herbal Viagra. They desperately go around the Spanish bars to find a solution.

17.title: Smulpap
17.plot: Leks got porridge from his mother, so he wouldn't starve. Stefke finds out that it is specially made for babies older than 4 months. He is even more disgusted to see Leks throwing in a kilo of sugar.

18.title: Bevervaart
18.plot: Besides a holy catholic place, Santiago do Compostela also seems to be a student city. That means party, women and alcohol for the Dutch boys.

19.title: Jan Doedel
19.plot: In Santiago do Compostela there are some pretty nice old buildings. People walk thousands of miles to get there and find some kind of expensive amusement park with LED candles.

20.title: Back 2 Skool
20.plot: What to do when you are traveling without electricity and Internet? You go to university and pretend to belong there as an exchange student. Stefke and Leks are pushing their limits in Santiago do Compostela.

imdb.title: Geiten
synopsis: After the summer of 2006, full of party at the beach, Leks & Stefan (both finished their studies) decided not to find a 9-5 job or to start a family, with a station wagon, 2 kids, a dog, a nagging wife and a mortgage. They left the moment their friends had to start work or study again and followed their dream of an endless summer. With Leks' old surf van and the boards on top, they drove south, following the sun and the coastline, from Holland, through Belgium, France, Spain, Portugal and Morocco, to end up in a totally different world, the Sahara. These series of a trailer and 80 episodes tells the story of the 2 crazy Dutch boys and their adventures during their mission to find themselves and the meaning of life. Humour is the most important aspect of the material, followed by the beauty of the landscapes and people they meet. Together they laugh, fight, learn and see the world as it really is. They are changed forever, crazy, but wise, although not everybody will see that...
